title: 9to5Mac Daily: October 10, 2024 – Apple exec changes, Amazon partnership

html:
Listen to a recap of the top stories of the day from 9to5Mac. 9to5Mac Daily is available on iTunes and Apple’s Podcasts app, Stitcher, TuneIn, Google Play, or through our dedicated RSS feed for Overcast and other podcast players.

Sponsored by Roborock: Level up your home cleaning automation with Roborock and save up to $650 for Prime Big Deals Day. 

New episodes of 9to5Mac Daily are recorded every weekday. Subscribe to our podcast in Apple Podcast or your favorite podcast player to guarantee new episodes are delivered as soon as they’re available.

Stories discussed in this episode:

  • Kuo: iPhone 16 sales match expectations so far, no cutbacks anticipated
  • Apple and Amazon strike deal to sell Apple TV+ through Prime Video
  • Veteran Apple engineering leader Dan Riccio retiring this month
